summary: An Ordinance repealing Ordinance No. 19254, entitled: "An Ordinance providing for the laying off, extending and establishing of an alley in each of Blocks Fifty-six (56) and Fifty-seven (57), in Gillman Park, an addition to the City of Seattle; and providing for the condemnation, appropriation, taking and damaging of land and other property necessary therefor; and providing that the payment for such improvement be made by special assessment upon property specially benefited, in the manner provided by law.", approved the 6th day of October, 1908.
